headline: Is Kevin McCarthy actually going to *do* something about Marjorie Taylor Greene?
author: Chris Cillizza
sentences: "Past comments from and endorsed by Marjorie Taylor Greene on school shootings, political violence, and anti-Semitic conspiracy theories do not represent the values or beliefs of the House Republican Conference," McCarthy said in a statement at the time.
